articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Multiple M-class solar flares erupt on the Sun triggering radio blackouts on Earth, reveals NOAA - HT Tech
articles.description: NOAA has revealed that multiple M-class solar flares have erupted on the Sun in the last 24 hours. These have triggered short-wave radio blackouts on the Earth. Check details here.
articles.content: Yesterday, December 5, a minor solar storm struck the Earth sparking auroras in the arctic circles. It was a minor affair, but the solar activities have been relentless with the Sun nearing the peak … [+2297 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Bridge-sized asteroid to come as close as 5.5mn km to Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A Near-Earth Asteroid which is bigger than the Empire State Building is predicted to pass Earth closely today, December 6. Know the asteroid’s speed, distance of approach, size, and other details, as per NASA.
articles.content: Telescopes such as NEOWISE, Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), Pans-STARRS1, and Catalina Sky Survey help NASA track and study asteroids that are present in space. After studying th… [+2128 chars]
